ie.gmit.computing.util

类 Tool

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.computing.util.Tool

  • public final class Tool
extends java.lang.Object
    It is a helper class which can be used to get and set children node values
    作者:
    Siyi_Kong

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static boolean addChildren(java.lang.String newNode, java.lang.String ParentNode)
      It is used to add a new node after a specified parent node
      static boolean addChildrenInBetween(java.lang.String newNode, java.lang.String ParentNode, java.lang.String childNode)
      It is used to add a new node in the middle of a specified parent node and its child node
      static void deleteNode(java.lang.String NodeName)
      It is used to judge if the node you are going to add is duplicated
      static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllChildren(Node node)
      It can return all children of a specific node
      static boolean nodeDuplicated(java.lang.String node)
      It is used to judge if the node you are going to add is duplicated
